seo.open_graph_description: Lightweight test post to verify viewer renders JSON next to index.html.

hello.intro: Welcome to the **Test Venue** sample. This post verifies that the page renders when a JSON file sits next to `index.html`. See the repo [here](https://github.com/sportdogfood/clear-round-datasets).
hello.outro: That’s it. If you can read this, the viewer works.

stay.title: Stay
stay.paragraph: Two simple options close to the venue. Bookable online.
